content: It’s interesting you consider that your story should trump their marriage and their wife’s exclusive access to the intimate side of the man in question. I find it absolutely remarkable, that you have framed your selfish opportunism as moral and their dedication to their marriage, as immoral. He has never said all women are temptresses, but it would be entirely unfair for him to say “I only have dinner with women I am in no way attracted to.” I’d bet that would have liberals and feminists even more up in arms.
